DOC.brief_summary: The goal study identify objective difference primary care traditional medicine resident clinical performance , continuity care utilization resource . Specifically , retrospective study analyze database collect CLIMACS , computer system Cornell Internal Medicine Associates ( CIMA ) . This system use clinical administrative purpose ; manage track patient 's information demographic , appointment booking , clinical diagnosis , prescription medication , laboratory radiology test , consults . In study , analyze subset CLIMACS database previous year .
DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Primary Care Traditional Internal Medicine Residents
DOC.detailed_description: Three area examine : 1 . Clinical performance 2 . Continuity care 3 . Utilization resource Clinical performance assess use Health Plan Employer data Information Set ( HEDIS ) performance standard . These standard develop purpose quality assessment , study examine follow HEDIS standard : 1 . Breast Cancer Screening- proportion woman age 52 64 mammogram within two year period . 2 . Cervical Cancer Screening- proportion woman age 21 64 Pap test precede 3 year . 3 . Cholesterol Screening- proportion patient age 20 39 40-59 cholesterol test least past five year . 4 . Asthma admission rate- proportion asthmatic admit hospital care asthma per year . 5 . Diabetic Standards- 1 . Admission cellulitis/ 1000 diabetic per year . 2 . Admission diabetes/ 1000 diabetic per year . 3 . Inpatient day per 100 diabetic per year . 4 . Prevalence ischemic heart disease . 5 . Prevalence severe renal disease . 6 . Diabetics > 2 hemoglobin A1C drawn per year . Continuity Care assess 3 different indicator : 1 . The proportion visit make designated primary care provider number visit make . 2 . The proportion miss appointment total number appointment . 3 . The proportion walk visit total number appointment . Resource utilization assess examine follow : 1 . Number lab test per year per patient . 2 . Number specialty consults per year per patient . 3 . Hospital admission rate per patient per year . 4 . Cost medication . Confidentiality maintain throughout study . In clinical practice access CLIMACS limit medical provider administrator individual access code . Furthermore , study remove specific identifier maintain anonymity patient resident .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients follow outpatient Cornell affiliate internist Cornell Internal Medicine Associates ( CIMA ) . 2 . Patients New York Hospital may may go follow outpatient CIMA . Patients elect participate study .
